Tomohiro Manabe

  • Yahoo Japan Corporation
    • Midtown Tower, 9-7-1 Akasaka, Minato-ku, Tokyo 107-6211 Japan
  • Doctor of Informatics in Social Informatics (Kyoto University, 2016)
  • Master of Informatics in Social Informatics (Kyoto University, 2013)
  • Bachelor of Engineering in Informatics and Mathematical Science (Kyoto University, 2011)
  • Member of the Database Society of Japan

Research Interests and Main Publications

Logical structure of tree-structured documents

  • Tomohiro Manabe and Keishi Tajima.
    Extracting Logical Hierarchical Structure of HTML Documents Based on Headings.
    Proc. of VLDB, vol. 8, no. 12, pp.1606-1617, August 2015.
    • Reference implementation
    • Data set

Automatic summarization of structured documents

  • Tomohiro Manabe and Keishi Tajima.
    Heading-Aware Snippet Generation for Web Search.
    In Proc. of AIRS, LNCS, vol. 9460, pp.188-200, 2015 (also to appear at KURENAI).
    • Results

Block-based web search

  • Tomohiro Manabe and Keishi Tajima.
    Heading-Aware Proximity Measure and Its Application to Web Search.
    DBSJ Journal, vol. 14, article no. 2, March 2016.
    • Output

Career Summary

2004. 4. 1 - 2007. 3. 1 : Student in the general education curriculum of Tokushima Prefectural Joto Senior High School
2007. 4. 1 - 2011. 3.24 : Student of Undergraduate School of Informatics and Mathematical Science of Faculty of Engineering of Kyoto University
2008. 4. 1 - 2011. 3.24 : Student in Computer Science Course of the same school
2010. 4. 9 - 2016. 3.23 : Member of Digital Library Group (or Tanaka Laboratory, formerly Tanaka and Tajima Laboratory) in Social Information Model Division of Department of Social Informatics of Graduate School of Informatics of Kyoto University
2010. 4.12 - 2016. 3. 9 : Advised by Prof. Keishi Tajima
2011. 4. 1 - 2013. 3.23 : Master course student of the same dept.
2013. 4. 1 - 2016. 3.23 : Doctoral student of the same dept.
2013. 4. 1 - 2016. 3.31 : Research fellow (DC1) of the Japan Society for the Promotion of Science
2016. 4. 1 - current : Yahoo Japan Corporation

Other Activities

Theme: Information extraction from web contents

Theme: Designing an HTML editor - not for the image conscious

Research Project: A Study on Block-Level Web Search (Grant Number: 13J06384)
